column5: hey folks...anyone know a not too expensive lower niagara river guide...I'm interested in trying for lakers/browns/rainbows in March and have never been there
Try calling Fishmaster, or PM him he knows the river I believe.
Heres one that I know you cant go wrong with.  http://www.niagarasportfishing.ca/index.php
Frank Di definetly puts fish in the boat
thanks!....I knew I could count on you folks!
Top Notch for sure, you won't be dissappointed!!
paul at www.castadventures.ca guides the river all the time. Great guy.  Good Luck
Hey Jerry 2 guy's beat me to it , but http://www.castadventures.ca/  with Paul Castellano is a good choice, nice guy and solid angling skills. Mark
I've never fished the Niagara river, but that Cast Adventures seem to be pretty popular.
